Hello avicus I have a scary story that just happened to me,

My mom's old 50 screen TV was broken so we had family friends come and install a new one they own a company,

The TV looked fine but when it turned on the screen was messed up so the men stayed looking calling best buy to get a new one then smoke came out of the side screen we ran and took it down and the men found out that the screen is a totally different problem then the smoke, this smoke would soon turn into fire if the screen was not messed up, I have to say I believe in god 100%, God saved my house and most likely my life.... 

If the screen wasn't bad the men would have left not noticing the smoke then would have started an electrical fire,

I am in a huge state of shock I feel light headed and I feel nousious as f_ck I probably wont play today seeing that I almost died
